title: American Horror Story Theory: LOST SOULS?
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: Oh god ! I love it ! We can see all the suffering of the characters, all the emotions .... Please, do more video like this !
Nice one !! Beautiful montage !! Can you tell me the song please ? Thank you
umm... if all seazons is conected, it meens Lange is dead and Farmiga will come back.
description:
AMERICAN HORROR STORY creator Ryan Murphy confirms what fans have long speculated: every season is connected! But how? What are the ongoing theories? See it.

How do you think the seasons are connected? Tell us in the comments!
